description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Clemens Vasters - Lead Architect, Microsoft Azure Service Bus

ABSTRACT
"Internet of Things" is a metaphor for how the infrastructure of our daily lives is being rapidly equipped with digital smarts. These arise from collecting and evaluating information and controlling systems based on gained insights. This trend provides significant opportunities [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Digital%20Infrastructure%20and%20Digital%20Utilities

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: GOTO 2016 • Digital Infrastructure and Digital Utilities • Clemens Vasters
